comment_body:
This tale was inspired by The Hanging Tree Song by James Newton Howard used in the film [The Hunger Games - A Mocking Jay.](https://youtu.be/oVg6_Z-ureE)

Thanks for reading and commenting! For more stories by myself please look [here!](https://www.reddit.com/r/A_Clockwork_Monkey?utm_medium=android_app&utm_source=share) For even more stories by my friends, please look [here!](https://www.reddit.com/r/TheCrypticCompendium?utm_medium=android_app&utm_source=share)
